page.title: 12Farming in the Kelso Area
page.content: Kelso is a good area for farming because the ground is very{fertile because of the river{Tweed}which runs though Kelso. Most of the land is {arable}and the farmers don't keep many animals. The{main crop}is{barley}but wheat, oilseed_rape, oats, potatoes, turnips and grass are also grown. I like oilseed_rape best because it makes the countryside look attractive because of its glowing yellow flowers. My dad sells chemicals like Tilt Turbo Slugkiller and many different kinds of weedkiller. I know farmers all over the Borders because I go round the farms with my dad in the holidays. I like farm vehicles because they are different from ordinary vehicles like cars and motorbikes. My favourites are tractors and three and four wheeled motorbikes which can pull spreading, spraying and seeding machines.
